title: Chapter 2581: Manual Calculation, Human Nature Rod, Cao Erzhu (2)
body:
Chapter 2581: Manual Calculation, Human Nature Rod, Cao Erzhu (2)

Chapter 2581: Manual Calculation, Human Nature Rod, Cao Erzhu (2)

Editor: Nyoi-Bo Studio

The Heaven and Earth spiritual energy roared and gathered from all directions.

The dragon fish in the small stone pond jumped out of the water and happily caught the spirit’s aura.

The wild beasts that hibernated in the forest gradually woke up as if they were bathed in spring rain. They let out slow and comfortable cries…

The entire Qingyuan Mountain started to move.

Vines, wood, flowers, birds, stones, water, clouds, and wind, all these became a part of the traceable divine path pattern.

They were able to form, construct, and transform into a seemingly tangible, but actually intangible, Heaven and Earth Great Array.

Yu Zhiwen’s mountain visit was extremely detailed.

She didn’t even need to outline all 33 of the divine path patterns, only nine.

The Thirty Three Heavens Star Weaving array quickly took shape under the convergence of the Heaven and Earth path techniques!

“So powerful.”

Cao Erzhu was dumbfounded.

He had never seen such a brilliant and powerful spiritual array before.

When he arrived at the table, he wanted to take away the things that August had left behind without exposing his spatial ring.

However, when the girl began to set up the array, even he felt that Qingyuan Mountain had moved, rejoiced and became more beautiful.

Spiritual energy, life, Great Path…

Everything started to return to a more fundamental direction!

Under such circumstances, the scene of a wild man who carried a desk and sprinted down the mountain would mar the beauty of the surroundings.

Therefore, Cao Erzhu did not move.

At the same time, he felt that the witch might not be a bad person.

Bad people didn’t have this kind of temperament, and they would not be so in tune with nature.

His father had said that he had a pure Dao heart, so he could empathize with the Great Path and enter the state of Enlightenment.

Moments earlier, Cao Erzhu had received his Enlightenment.

However, what he comprehended wasn’t power. He saw Qingyuan Mountain’s vitality through its essence.

All of this was brought about by that fairy!

“Actually, we can be friends…” Cao Erzhu only hesitated for a moment before he shook his head and rejected this idea.

He felt that this might be something of a sham.

Because kindness could be disguised, he still could not speak too much to prevent himself from being kidnapped.

The Spiritual Cultivation world was too terrifying!

When the Qingyuan Mountain great array entered its final stage, the beautiful patterns on the girl’s body gradually disappeared…

Cao Erzhu didn’t dare to ruin this beautiful scene. In the end, he carefully picked up the table, held down the stuff on it and ran off in small steps.

If she doesn’t leave, I’ll leave.

That should be fine, right?

While Yu Zhiwen set up the array, she also kept an eye on the big guy’s activities. After she noticed his clumsy movements, a complicated look flashed across her eyes.

“Pure heart…”

She finally found a word that perfectly described this big guy who was only a few years older than her, but was younger in mental years.

Wasn’t this the same as herself on the Sacred Mountain Gui Zhe, when she had yet to develop any conflict with the rules?

However…

Today, she had already walked down the Saint mountain and had been tainted by the worldliness of the human world.

However, this person was still as pure as the clear spring in the small stone pond, and still retained the true Innate Stage.

When she looked at him, it was like looking at her previous self…

“I’m sorry, I’m new here and I lied to you out of vigilance. Actually, I’m not a Spirit Array Caster, but a Divine Sorceress.” Yu Zhiwen suddenly said.

Cao Erzhu, who carried the table, stopped in his tracks.

He didn’t respond. He just pursed his lips and continued to walk down the mountain.

“I’m not Yu Xingxing either. I’m Yu Zhiwen.”

The sound of the waterfall came from behind again. Cao Erzhu stopped for the second time.

He could feel how kind the girl was. He couldn’t hold it in any longer and turned around. “I lied too.”

“I could tell that you’re not a senior. You’re actually not much older than me.” Yu Zhiwen’s eyes sparkled.

It was not just this…

Cao Erzhu shook his head slightly. He felt that he had already told too many lies. He felt guilty and did not know where to start.

“I’m sorry to have taken up your space. See you again if we are fated to meet.” Yu Zhiwen waved her hand.

No need to apologize, I should be the one to apologize…

Cao Erzhu opened his mouth, but he couldn’t say the d*mned words. He was like a real mute.

He held it in for a long time before he finally said, “Then, goodbye.”

“May I know your name?” This person knew Xu Xiaoshou, so Yu Zhiwen couldn’t just let him go.

She secretly repented and felt ashamed of her own depravity and for having learned to take advantage of kindness.

Because at this point, she knew that if it was her in the past, she would have been tricked into revealing everything.

“My name is…”

After a pause, another name flashed through Cao Erzhu’s mind.

It was a name his father had told him to use when he went out and had to deal with strangers. It was called Rock Luo.

“My name is Cao Erzhu.” Rock Luo said sincerely as he scratched his head while he carried the table.

“Buzz!”

The Qingyuan Mountain great array suddenly shook, and the spiritual energy was disturbed. The great array almost failed.

Yu Zhiwen’s hands trembled.

Cao Erzhu?

She knew this name!

If it was before, she really wouldn’t have noticed this simple mortal name.

However, the Heavenly Group’s operation had already reached Jade Capital City from the Four Symbols Mystic Realm. It seemed that they had also reached Changde Town.

Everything was targeted at Xu Xiaoshou!

Hallmaster Dao did not tell her the reason why she had come to Qingyuan Mountain to form the Thirty Three Heavens Star Weaving array…

According to her calculations, the probability of Xu Xiaoshou appearing in Qingyuan Mountain was not high. The focus was on the Cao’s Blacksmith Shop…

However, this was what Hallmaster Dao had arranged!

Yu Zhiwen did not dare to relax.

She had a feeling that this array might really be used to deal with Xu Xiaoshou.
